text: Ndipo onse adapitirira kuyenda mpaka pamene adapeza anthu a mu mzinda wina wake ndipo iwo adawafunsa anthu aja kuti awapatseko chakudya koma iwo adakana kuwalandira ngati alendo awo. Iwo adapeza mu mzindawo chipupa chikufuna kugwa ndipo Iye adachimanganso. Mose adati, “Iwe ukadafuna, ndithudi, ukadawauza kuti akulipire chifukwa cha ntchito imene wagwira.”
